languages.text: "Не будем лишний раз дырявить трофейный корабль. Кормчий, слушай мою команду: выпустить торпеду под верхней палубой, подорвать снаряд на подходе к цели. Такая взрывная волна обшивку не пробьет, но застопорит лифтовые системы и закроет проход пиратам с нижних уровней".

"Let's not put any more holes in our trophy than necessary. Master Helmsman, here are your orders: send a torpedo just below the upper deck and detonate in proximity to the target. A blast wave like that won't penetrate the hull, but it will paralyse the elevator systems and block the pirates' approach from the lower decks."
languages.original_text: "Не будем лишний раз дырявить трофейный корабль. Кормчий, слушай мою команду: выпустить торпеду под верхней палубой, подорвать снаряд на подходе к цели. Такая взрывная волна обшивку не пробьет, но застопорит лифтовые системы и закроет проход пиратам с нижних уровней".

Master Helmsman, here are your orders: send a torpedo just below the upper deck and detonate in proximity to the target. A blast wave like that won't penetrate the hull, but it will paralyse the elevator systems and block the pirates' approach from the lower decks."

A blast wave like that won't penetrate the hull, but it will paralyse the elevator systems and block the pirates' approach from the lower decks."

languages.text: "Wir sollten nicht mehr Löcher in unsere Trophäe machen als unbedingt nötig. Hauptsteuermann, hier sind Eure Befehle: Feuert einen Torpedo direkt unter das Oberdeck und zündet ihn in der Nähe des Ziels. Die Explosion wird den Rumpf nicht durchschlagen, aber die Aufzugssysteme lahmlegen und den Zugang der Piraten von den unteren Decks blockieren."
languages.original_text: "Let's not put any more holes in our trophy than necessary. Master Helmsman, here are your orders: send a torpedo just below the upper deck and detonate in proximity to the target. A blast wave like that won't penetrate the hull, but it will paralyse the elevator systems and block the pirates' approach from the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sollten nicht mehr Löcher in unsere Trophäe machen als unbedingt nötig. Hauptsteuermann, hier sind Eure Befehle: Feuert einen Torpedo direkt unter das Oberdeck und zündet ihn in der Nähe des Ziels. Die Explosion wird den Rumpf nicht durchschlagen, aber die Aufzugssysteme lahmlegen und den Zugang der Piraten von den unteren Decks blockieren."

languages.text: « Évitons d'abîmer notre trophée davantage. Voilà vos ordres, maître timonier : envoyez une torpille juste en dessous du pont supérieur et faites-la exploser près de la cible. Une telle onde de choc ne perforera pas la coque, mais elle paralysera les ascenseurs et empêchera les pirates d'accéder aux ponts inférieurs. »
languages.original_text: "Let's not put any more holes in our trophy than necessary. Master Helmsman, here are your orders: send a torpedo just below the upper deck and detonate in proximity to the target. A blast wave like that won't penetrate the hull, but it will paralyse the elevator systems and block the pirates' approach from the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: « Évitons d'abîmer notre trophée davantage. Voilà vos ordres, maître timonier : envoyez une torpille juste en dessous du pont supérieur et faites-la exploser près de la cible. Une telle onde de choc ne perforera pas la coque, mais elle paralysera les ascenseurs et empêchera les pirates d'accéder aux ponts inférieurs. »

languages.text: “还是别在战利品上打太多洞了吧，舵手长。让你的人朝上层甲板底层发射鱼雷，让鱼雷在目标附近引爆。鱼雷的冲击波不会炸穿舰体，但可以让电梯系统瘫痪。这样一来，底层甲板的海盗就上不来了。”
languages.original_text: "Let's not put any more holes in our trophy than necessary. Master Helmsman, here are your orders: send a torpedo just below the upper deck and detonate in proximity to the target. A blast wave like that won't penetrate the hull, but it will paralyse the elevator systems and block the pirates' approach from the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: “还是别在战利品上打太多洞了吧，舵手长。让你的人朝上层甲板底层发射鱼雷，让鱼雷在目标附近引爆。鱼雷的冲击波不会炸穿舰体，但可以让电梯系统瘫痪。这样一来，底层甲板的海盗就上不来了。”

languages.text: «No abramos más agujeros de los necesarios en nuestro trofeo. Maestro timonel, estas son sus órdenes: dispare un torpedo justo debajo de la cubierta superior y detónelo cuando se aproxime al objetivo. La onda de choque no perforará el casco, pero paralizará los sistemas de los ascensores y bloqueará a los piratas de las cubiertas inferiores».
languages.original_text: "Let's not put any more holes in our trophy than necessary. Master Helmsman, here are your orders: send a torpedo just below the upper deck and detonate in proximity to the target. A blast wave like that won't penetrate the hull, but it will paralyse the elevator systems and block the pirates' approach from the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: «No abramos más agujeros de los necesarios en nuestro trofeo. Maestro timonel, estas son sus órdenes: dispare un torpedo justo debajo de la cubierta superior y detónelo cuando se aproxime al objetivo. La onda de choque no perforará el casco, pero paralizará los sistemas de los ascensores y bloqueará a los piratas de las cubiertas inferiores».

languages.text: 「戦利品に必要以上の穴を開けるのはやめよう。マスター・ヘルムスマン、これが君への命令だ。上層デッキのすぐ下に魚雷を送り、目標に近接して爆発させろ。爆風では船体を貫通しないが、エレベーターシステムを麻痺させ、下層デッキからの海賊の接近を阻止できる」
languages.original_text: "Let's not put any more holes in our trophy than necessary. Master Helmsman, here are your orders: send a torpedo just below the upper deck and detonate in proximity to the target. A blast wave like that won't penetrate the hull, but it will paralyse the elevator systems and block the pirates' approach from the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: 「戦利品に必要以上の穴を開けるのはやめよう。マスター・ヘルムスマン、これが君への命令だ。上層デッキのすぐ下に魚雷を送り、目標に近接して爆発させろ。爆風では船体を貫通しないが、エレベーターシステムを麻痺させ、下層デッキからの海賊の接近を阻止できる」

languages.text: "Ödülümüzü gereğinden fazla delik deşik etmeyelim. Başserdümen, emirlerini dinle: Bir torpidoyu üst güvertenin hemen altına yolla ve hedefe yakın mesafede patlat. Böyle bir patlama gövdeyi delmez ama asansör sistemlerini felç eder ve korsanların alt güvertelerden yaklaşmasını engeller."
languages.original_text: "Let's not put any more holes in our trophy than necessary. Master Helmsman, here are your orders: send a torpedo just below the upper deck and detonate in proximity to the target. A blast wave like that won't penetrate the hull, but it will paralyse the elevator systems and block the pirates' approach from the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: "Ödülümüzü gereğinden fazla delik deşik etmeyelim. Başserdümen, emirlerini dinle: Bir torpidoyu üst güvertenin hemen altına yolla ve hedefe yakın mesafede patlat. Böyle bir patlama gövdeyi delmez ama asansör sistemlerini felç eder ve korsanların alt güvertelerden yaklaşmasını engeller."
